Trade/Device Name(s): Troponin I Ultra Calibrator for ADVIA IMS System
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Troponin I Ultra immunoassay and calibrator for ADVIA IMS System to measure cardiac Troponin I in human serum and plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of cardiac Troponin I in serum and plasma to aid diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction and risk stratification of patients with non-ST segment-elevation acute coronary syndromes; calibrator for in vitro calibration of the assay.
